title: Any Yasuo mains want to talk yasuo?
body:
Really hate people randomly ban Yasuo!  {{champion:157}}   Cause they think they will get a teammate bad as Yasuo....But most time Yasuo mains feel tired about it...Because  your enemy ban yasuo, your teammate will ban yasuo too, even you shown you want play Yasuo, they still do it.   This is the condition of Yasuo mains.....
So every game when I join, I must type, don't  ban Yasuo plz...so tired...

replies.body: Nobody likes Yasuo other than Yasuo players.
lol， I dont rly know it, but I think everyone should love him.

Yeah, so fun to be outscaled by mid game even if you won your lane. I also like how he can block any skill shot in the game and zone out adcs with nothing but one ability. But the best part has to be how he can ignore 50% of your armor. So fun to play against!
。。。Jesus, if u build tank like mundo, Yas cant win...
Unless Mundo has some way to apply grevious wounds, I'm pretty sure Yasuo can out sustain him. Specially if Mundo goes full tank.
Just ban the E spam.
65% banrate man.
...Thats it....
With an 18% pick rate and a 50% winrate, not to say he is or isn't OP, but personally hate playing against Yasuo if he hasn't become the most common champion to meet in any game.
People ban zed? Where is this?
Everywhere actually, he has a 44% banrate iirc, I ban him too, but probably not for the same reason. It's more a "I don't feel like dealing with this right now" ban.

http://champion.gg/champion/Zed

44.2% Banrate.
At least, they are afraid enemy pick, but sometimes people ban Yas because they fear I pick....
some people are too ignorant and bad to learn how to play against him so they ban him instead :^)
...Maybe you are right!

I dont like playing with Yasuo because:

- a lot of his mains are toxic
- a lot of his mains are kids
- he often goes 1v5 
- if he loses lane he will still try to 1v1 and lose even harder
- they never ulti if you take a knockup champ just for them
- they push mindlessly and get ganked all the time
- and if he is actually good, I feel sorry for enemy team fighting the cancer of league

I dont like playing against Yasuo because:

- manaless
- infinite mobility
- only needs 2 damage items to deal same damage as some do with 6
- free armor pen so that getting tanky doesnt help 1 bit
- can easily dodge skillshots with infinite dashes
- if he curently cant dash to dodge, he will just destroy everything by pressing w in any direction
- w can ruin entire kits of some champions even if cast poorly
- has good early, mid and late game
- has no mana
- manaless

So yes I will ban {{champion:157}}  every game because he is the most toxic champion RIOT has released so far and I dont care that you are going to cry about it, we have only this small protection from champs that makes us not enjoy the game, these 3 little bans and the fact that we all use them on the same guy has something to say about his design... Btw cant wait for season 7  above 95% ban rate. Enjoy :)

The real Yasuo mains, never lose lane by itself. 
Knockup champion he will always catch.
He will also had most farms in game.
Finally, he will carry your game.
I don't think you understand. People just don't want to fucking see Yasuo in every game.

> [{quoted}](name=DoktorKaiser,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BGzKd5dB,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2016-10-09T19:27:20.825+0000)
>
> So yes I will ban {{champion:157}}  every game

Wait till 10 bans come out. No one will ever be able to play Yasuo again.
Yeah I mentioned it later, in season 7 I expect Yasuo to have above 95% ban rate, unless he is extreme trash tier, which will hopefully result in him getting full rework.
I switched from Yas permaban to Nid permaban. :3 no worries here.
Doesn't Shyvana destroy Nid easily though?

> [{quoted}](name=TyrekGoldenspear,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=BGzKd5dB,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2016-10-09T21:56:23.815+0000)
>
> Doesn't Shyvana destroy Nid easily though?

Not from my experience nor general consensus no. Perhaps you are just that good or the Nidalee that bad. Shy's win rate against her averahes 44%. Nidalee's insane safety, burst, kiting and good clear are dangerous for Shyvana.

Oh well I certainly am not good at Shyv yet.

I assumed Shyv's dueling prowess and tankiness would help her win a 1v1 agains Nid, but I forgot about Nid's leap offering mobility and escape that Shyv cannot match.

Yeah i can see that win rate now.

I ban Yasuo cause there hasn't been a game where I haven't seen a Yasuo feed their own lane, then feed other lanes even tho their intention was to try and help. 
So I got tired of just seeing it and ban him.

Tho if Vayne is in the free week rotation I ban her instead, cause well same reasons most people that I've seen play Vayne are awful.

 I'm only silver, but there's only so much suffering one can take in any bracket, I know that much.

yup the only reason i wasn't able to play Yasuo in ranked  like most of the time enemy team ban him and sometimes my team mate does! 
yasuo is the only champ i main him externally like im not good with other champs .... does people ban him because they are noobs against  him or just his OP as people say..... even though his hard to master and u cant use his ult when ever u want and his W and E u can use it once only against enemy champ huh
With all of these people saying how OP syndra is, this is what is going to happen to my main .-.
Welcome to our world.
